description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记。他被视为改革派领导人，其去世引发了1989年天安门广场抗议。
description.en: Chinese politician who was a high-ranking official of the People's Republic of China. He served as Chairman and General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party. He was a reformist leader whose death triggered the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国最高领导人。他是胡耀邦的政治导师，但后来也迫使胡耀邦辞职。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He was Hu Yaobang's political mentor but also later forced his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，胡耀邦的亲密盟友，接替胡耀邦担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, a close ally of Hu Yaobang who succeeded him as General Secretary of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家和政治家，中华人民共和国的缔造者。胡耀邦在早期支持他，但在文化大革命期间被他清洗。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary and founding father of the People's Republic of China. Hu Yaobang supported him early on but was purged by him during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，毛泽东的继任者。胡耀邦反对他的“两个凡是”政策。
description.en: Chinese politician and Mao Zedong's successor. Hu Yaobang opposed his 'Two Whatevers' policy.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，胡耀邦的朋友，曾在胡耀邦被迫辞职时为他辩护。
description.en: Chinese politician and friend of Hu Yaobang, who defended him during his forced resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中共地方指挥官，在长征前夕救了胡耀邦的命。
description.en: A local communist commander who saved Hu Yaobang's life before the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动的政治运动，在此期间胡耀邦曾两次被清洗。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong, during which Hu Yaobang was purged twice.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一群在1980年代和1990年代主导中国政治的中共元老。他们中的许多人反对胡耀邦的改革。
description.en: A group of elderly CCP members who dominated Chinese politics in the 1980s and 1990s. Many of them opposed Hu Yaobang's reforms.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底在中国各地发生的一系列学生抗议活动，被认为是导致胡耀邦下台的导火索。
description.en: A series of student protests across China in late 1986, which were used as a pretext for Hu Yaobang's removal from power.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦于1989年4月15日去世，引发了公众大规模的悼念活动，并最终演变成1989年天安门广场抗议。
description.en: The death of Hu Yaobang on April 15, 1989, which sparked large-scale public mourning that eventually led to the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 由胡耀邦去世引发的学生领导的示威活动，最终以军事镇压告终。
description.en: Student-led demonstrations triggered by the death of Hu Yaobang, which ended in a military crackdown.

nodes.id: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest-ranking office of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1982年间中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest-ranking office of the Chinese Communist Party from 1945 to 1982.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后纠正其错误的社会政治运动，胡耀邦在该运动中发挥了重要作用。
description.en: A socio-political movement after the Cultural Revolution to correct its mistakes, in which Hu Yaobang played an important role.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省的县级市，是胡耀邦的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Hunan province, China, and the birthplace of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。他曾在1985年至1987年间与胡耀邦共事。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the People's Republic of China. He worked with Hu Yaobang from 1985 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国最高领导人。他在2005年宣布为胡耀邦平反。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He announced plans to rehabilitate Hu Yaobang in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中华人民共和国最高领导人。他于2015年为胡耀邦举行了高规格的百年诞辰纪念活动。
description.en: Chinese politician, the current paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He held a high-profile commemoration for Hu Yaobang's 100th birth anniversary in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦与李昭于1941年在延安结婚，直至1989年胡耀邦去世。
description.en: Hu Yaobang and Li Zhao married in Yan'an in 1941 and remained married until his death in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦于1933年成为中国共产党正式党员，直至去世。
description.en: Hu Yaobang became a full member of the Chinese Communist Party in 1933 and remained a member until his death.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦是邓小平的亲密盟友和门生，两人的关系始于1930年代。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was a close ally and protégé of Deng Xiaoping, with their relationship dating back to the 1930s.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平策划了胡耀邦的权力崛起，使其成为中国共产党的最高领导人之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping engineered Hu Yaobang's rise to power, positioning him as one of the top leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1987年1月，邓小平与党内元老一起迫使胡耀邦因对学生抗议处理过宽而辞去总书记职务。
description.en: In January 1987, Deng Xiaoping, along with party elders, forced Hu Yaobang to resign as General Secretary for being too lenient with student protesters.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，胡耀邦曾两次被清洗和迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Hu Yaobang was purged and persecuted twice.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在文化大革命期间清洗了胡耀邦。
description.en: Mao Zedong purged Hu Yaobang during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦与赵紫阳是亲密盟友，并在邓小平的领导下共同推动改革。
description.en: Hu Yaobang and Zhao Ziyang were close allies who worked together to promote reforms under Deng Xiaoping's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦的政治和经济改革使他成为多位反对自由市场和政府改革的党内元老的敌人。
description.en: Hu Yaobang's political and economic reforms made him the enemy of several powerful Party elders who opposed free-market and government reforms.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦的政治对手利用1986年的学生抗议活动作为借口，指责他对“资产阶级自由化”过于宽容，最终导致他被迫辞职。
description.en: Hu Yaobang's political opponents used the 1986 student protests as a pretext to blame him for his tolerance of 'bourgeois liberalization,' leading to his forced resignation.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦的去世引发了公众大规模的哀悼活动，这些活动逐渐演变为要求政治改革的抗议，并最终导致了1989年天安门广场事件。
description.en: The death of Hu Yaobang sparked widespread public mourning, which evolved into protests for political reform and eventually led to the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 在长征开始前，地方共产党指挥官谭余保在最后一刻介入，将胡耀邦从死刑中救下。
description.en: Before the Long March began, local communist commander Tan Yubao intervened at the last minute, saving Hu Yaobang from a death sentence.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦反对华国锋的“两个凡是”政策，是支持邓小平上台的重要人物。
description.en: Hu Yaobang opposed Hua Guofeng's 'Two Whatevers' policy and was an important supporter of Deng Xiaoping's ascent to power.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在“拨乱反正”时期发挥了重要作用，亲自负责为超过三百万在文化大革命中受迫害的人平反。
description.en: Hu Yaobang played an important role in the 'Boluan Fanzheng' program and was personally responsible for exonerating over three million people who had been persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在胡耀邦被迫发表自我批评并辞职的会议上，习仲勋是唯一站出来为他辩护的盟友。
description.en: During the meeting where Hu Yaobang was forced to issue a self-criticism and resign, Xi Zhongxun was the only ally who stood up and defended him.

relationships.target: General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦担任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦出生于中国湖南省浏阳县。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was born in Liuyang county, Hunan province, China.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝在1985年至1987年期间曾与胡耀邦共事，并视其为导师。
description.en: Wen Jiabao worked with Hu Yaobang from 1985 to 1987 and considered him a mentor.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于2005年宣布为胡耀邦平反，并举办了纪念活动，正式恢复了其声誉。
description.en: In 2005, Hu Jintao announced plans to rehabilitate Hu Yaobang, organizing commemorative events and officially restoring his image.

description.zh-cn: 习近平于2015年为胡耀邦举行了高规格的百年诞辰纪念活动，并高度评价其历史贡献。
description.en: In 2015, Xi Jinping held a high-profile commemoration for Hu Yaobang's 100th birth anniversary and praised his historical contributions.
